itemDescription: Scottish reporter for BBC Radio 5 Live

wikipedia_page.main: Lesley Christine Ashmall (born 31 December 1966) is a Scottish reporter for BBC Radio 5 Live.

response: |coverage of the Asian Tsunami, presented by Christian Fraser, Ross Hawkins, Shelagh Fogarty and Lesley Ashmall
*22 April – Lesley Ashmall and John Pienaar replace Aasmah Mir as presenters of The Weekend News with Aasmah taking over presenting duties on The Midday News.
